What do 2:01 poke, 2:03 forcefully, 4:54 bring out, 6:12 setting, 6:16 workforce mean?

Reply: poke= to push a finger or other pointed object quickly into someone or something, forcely means extremly strong, setting= context, workforce= workers( a group of people), bring out= make a particular quality or detail noticeable
